text: Veikko Salminen (born 12 August 1945) is a Finnish modern pentathlete and fencer. He won a bronze medal in the team modern pentathlon event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. His daughter, Laura Salminen, and son, Ismo Salminen, are also a modern pentathlon athletes. == References == Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Helsinki Category:Finnish male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Finland Category:Olympic modern pentathletes of Finland Category:Finnish male modern pentathletes Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Modern pentathletes at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Finland Category:Olympic medalists in modern pentathlon Category:Medalists at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Veikko Salminen
